languages.text: {n}Острая молниеносная боль пронзает ваш висок — словно в ответ на услышанное. Вы понимаете, что благодарить за подобную удачу стоит не Бога-Императора. В голове звенят {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_EdgeHelp}слова исчадия{/d}, явившегося вам во время трансляции.{/n} "Я — воля Ткача Судеб, и сегодня я сплету новую нить из прихотливых вероятностей и ускользающих шансов. Нить, что выведет тебя из пасти необратимости. Нить, что позволит тебе отыскать ключи к спасению."

traits.locale_text: {n}Острая молниеносная боль пронзает ваш висок — словно в ответ на услышанное. Вы понимаете, что благодарить за подобную удачу стоит не Бога-Императора. В голове звенят слова исчадия, явившегося вам во время трансляции.{/n} "Я — воля Ткача Судеб, и сегодня я сплету новую нить из прихотливых вероятностей и ускользающих шансов. Нить, что выведет тебя из пасти необратимости."

languages.text: {n}A sharp bolt of pain lances through your skull as if in response to what you just heard. You understand that it is not the God-Emperor you should thank for such good fortune. The {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_EdgeHelp}words of the daemon{/d} that appeared before you during the translation to realspace echo in your mind.{/n} "I am the will of the Weaver of Destinies, and today, I will weave a new thread of elusive possibilities and fickle chances. The thread that will lead you out of the maw of irreversibility. The thread that will help you find the keys to salvation."
languages.original_text: {n}Острая молниеносная боль пронзает ваш висок — словно в ответ на услышанное. Вы понимаете, что благодарить за подобную удачу стоит не Бога-Императора. В голове звенят {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_EdgeHelp}слова исчадия{/d}, явившегося вам во время трансляции.{/n} "Я — воля Ткача Судеб, и сегодня я сплету новую нить из прихотливых вероятностей и ускользающих шансов. Нить, что выведет тебя из пасти необратимости. Нить, что позволит тебе отыскать ключи к спасению."

The words of the daemon that appeared before you during the translation to realspace echo in your mind.{/n} "I am the will of the Weaver of Destinies, and today, I will weave a new thread of elusive possibilities and fickle chances. The thread that will lead you out of the maw of irreversibility. The thread that will help you find the keys to salvation."

{n}A sharp bolt of pain lances through your skull as if in response to what you just heard. You understand that it is not the God-Emperor you should thank for such good fortune. The words of the daemon that appeared before you during the translation to realspace echo in your mind.{/n} "I am the will of the Weaver of Destinies, and today, I will weave a new thread of elusive possibilities and fickle chances. The thread that will lead you out of the maw of irreversibility."

languages.text: {n}一阵尖锐的疼痛刺穿了你的头颅，仿佛是在回应着你刚刚听到的话。你明白了，你的好运并不是神皇带来的。当你回到真实世界时，那位出现在你面前的{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_EdgeHelp}恶魔说过的话{/d}，如今在你的脑海中回响起来。{/n}“我是命运编织者的意志。今日，我将在难以捉摸的无数可能，以及变化莫测的诸多机会之中，编织出一条新的命运之线。这条线将带领你走出避无可避的巨口，帮助你找到救赎的钥匙。”
languages.original_text: {n}A sharp bolt of pain lances through your skull as if in response to what you just heard. You understand that it is not the God-Emperor you should thank for such good fortune. The {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_EdgeHelp}words of the daemon{/d} that appeared before you during the translation to realspace echo in your mind.{/n} "I am the will of the Weaver of Destinies, and today, I will weave a new thread of elusive possibilities and fickle chances. The thread that will lead you out of the maw of irreversibility. The thread that will help you find the keys to salvation."

traits.locale_text: {n}一阵尖锐的疼痛刺穿了你的头颅，仿佛是在回应着你刚刚听到的话。你明白了，你的好运并不是神皇带来的。当你回到真实世界时，那位出现在你面前的恶魔说过的话，如今在你的脑海中回响起来。{/n}“我是织命者的意志。今日，我将在难以捉摸的无数可能，以及变化莫测的诸多机会之中，编织出一条新的命运之线。这条线将带领你走出避无可避的巨口。”

languages.text: {n}その話に反応するかのように、鋭い痛みが頭蓋骨を突き抜ける。こんな幸運に感謝すべき相手は神帝陛下ではない、そう分かった。リアルスペースへ移動する最中、目の前に現れた{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_EdgeHelp}ディーモンの言葉{/d}が心の中でこだまする。{/n}「我は運命の操り手の意志。今日は、するりと逃げそうな可能性と気まぐれな巡り合わせの混じった新たな糸を紡ぐ。その糸は、お前を不可逆の入り口から出れるように誘うだろう。そして、救いの鍵を見つける手助けをしてくれる」
languages.original_text: {n}A sharp bolt of pain lances through your skull as if in response to what you just heard. You understand that it is not the God-Emperor you should thank for such good fortune. The {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_EdgeHelp}words of the daemon{/d} that appeared before you during the translation to realspace echo in your mind.{/n} "I am the will of the Weaver of Destinies, and today, I will weave a new thread of elusive possibilities and fickle chances. The thread that will lead you out of the maw of irreversibility. The thread that will help you find the keys to salvation."

traits.locale_text: {n}今聞いたことに反応するかのように、鋭い痛みが頭蓋骨を突き抜ける。このような幸運に感謝すべきは神帝陛下ではないとあなたは理解した。リアルスペースへの転送中にあなたの前に現れたディーモンの言葉が、あなたの心に響く。{/n}「我は運命を織る者の意志であり、今、我はとらえどころのない可能性と気まぐれな好機の新たな糸を紡ぐ。その糸は、お前を不可逆性の入り口から導き出すだろう」

languages.text: {n}Ein stechender Schmerz rast durch deinen Schädel, wie als Reaktion auf das, was du gerade gehört hast. Dir wird klar, dass du nicht dem Gottimperator für so viel Glück danken solltest. Die {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_EdgeHelp}Worte des Dämons{/d} beim Übertritt in den Realraum hallen in deinem Geist wider.{/n} "Ich bin der Wille des Webers der Schicksale, und ich werde heute einen neuen Faden schwer fassbarer Möglichkeiten und unbeständiger Chancen weben. Dieser Faden wird Euch aus dem Schlund der Unumkehrbarkeit führen. Er wird Euch helfen, den Schlüssel zur Erlösung zu finden."
languages.original_text: {n}A sharp bolt of pain lances through your skull as if in response to what you just heard. You understand that it is not the God-Emperor you should thank for such good fortune. The {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_EdgeHelp}words of the daemon{/d} that appeared before you during the translation to realspace echo in your mind.{/n} "I am the will of the Weaver of Destinies, and today, I will weave a new thread of elusive possibilities and fickle chances. The thread that will lead you out of the maw of irreversibility. The thread that will help you find the keys to salvation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein stechender Schmerz rast durch deinen Schädel, wie als Reaktion auf das, was du gerade gehört hast. Dir wird klar, dass du nicht dem Gottimperator für so viel Glück danken solltest. Die Worte des Dämons beim Übertritt in den Realraum hallen in deinem Geist wider.{/n} "Ich bin der Wille des Webers der Schicksale, und ich werde heute einen neuen Faden schwer fassbarer Möglichkeiten und unbeständiger Chancen weben. Dieser Faden wird Euch aus dem Schlund der Unumkehrbarkeit führen."

languages.text: {n}Une vive douleur vous transperce le crâne, comme en réaction à ce que vous venez d'entendre. Vous comprenez que ce n'est pas à la volonté de l'Empereur-Dieu que vous devez une telle aubaine. Les {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_EdgeHelp}mots du démon{/d} qui vous est apparu lors du passage vers l'espace réel résonnent dans votre esprit.{/n} « Je suis la volonté du Tisseur de Destins et aujourd'hui, je vais tracer un nouveau fil de possibilités fugaces et de chances incertaines. Ce fil vous guidera hors de la gueule de l'irrévocable. Il vous aidera à trouver les clés du salut. »
languages.original_text: {n}A sharp bolt of pain lances through your skull as if in response to what you just heard. You understand that it is not the God-Emperor you should thank for such good fortune. The {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_EdgeHelp}words of the daemon{/d} that appeared before you during the translation to realspace echo in your mind.{/n} "I am the will of the Weaver of Destinies, and today, I will weave a new thread of elusive possibilities and fickle chances. The thread that will lead you out of the maw of irreversibility. The thread that will help you find the keys to salvation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Une vive douleur vous transperce le crâne, comme en réaction à ce que vous venez d'entendre. Vous comprenez que ce n'est pas à la volonté de l'Empereur-Dieu que vous devez une telle aubaine. Les mots du démon qui vous est apparu lors du passage dans l'espace réel résonnent dans votre esprit.{/n} « Je suis la volonté du Tisseur de Destins et aujourd'hui, je vais tracer un nouveau fil de possibilités fugaces et de chances incertaines. Un fil qui vous mènera hors de la gueule de l'irréversibilité. »

languages.text: {n}Un aguijonazo de dolor atraviesa tu cráneo, como en respuesta a lo que acabas de oír. Comprendes que esta buena fortuna no se debe al Dios Emperador. Las {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_EdgeHelp}palabras del daemon{/d} que apareció ante ti durante la transición al espacio real resuenan en tu cabeza.{/n} «Soy la voluntad del Tejedor de Destinos, y hoy urdiré un nuevo hilo de posibilidades esquivas y probabilidades volátiles. El hilo que te sacará de las fauces de la irreversibilidad y te ayudará a encontrar las claves de tu salvación».
languages.original_text: {n}A sharp bolt of pain lances through your skull as if in response to what you just heard. You understand that it is not the God-Emperor you should thank for such good fortune. The {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_EdgeHelp}words of the daemon{/d} that appeared before you during the translation to realspace echo in your mind.{/n} "I am the will of the Weaver of Destinies, and today, I will weave a new thread of elusive possibilities and fickle chances. The thread that will lead you out of the maw of irreversibility. The thread that will help you find the keys to salvation."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un aguijonazo de dolor atraviesa tu cráneo, como en respuesta a lo que acabas de oír. Comprendes que esta buena fortuna no se debe al Dios Emperador. Las palabras del daemon que apareció ante tu durante la transición al espacio real resuenan en tu cabeza.{/n} «Soy la voluntad del Tejedor de Destinos, y hoy urdiré un nuevo hilo de posibilidades esquivas y probabilidades volátiles. El hilo que te sacará de las fauces de la irreversibilidad».

languages.text: {n}Az önce duydukların karşısında keskin bir acı, başına mızrak gibi saplanıyor. Böylesine iyi bir talih için şükredilmesi gerekenin Tanrı İmparator olmadığını anlıyorsun. Gerçekuzaya geçtiğiniz sırada karşına çıkan {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_EdgeHelp}iblisin sözleri{/d} zihninde yankılanıyor.{/n} "Ben, Kader Dokuyan'ın iradesiyim ve bugün, ele zor geçen fırsatlar ve dönek ihtimallerle dolu yeni bir iplik dokuyacağım. Bu iplik, seni geri çevrilemezliğin sivri dişlerine uzanan yoldan kurtaracak. Kurtuluşun anahtarlarını bulmanda yardımcı olacak."
languages.original_text: {n}A sharp bolt of pain lances through your skull as if in response to what you just heard. You understand that it is not the God-Emperor you should thank for such good fortune. The {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_EdgeHelp}words of the daemon{/d} that appeared before you during the translation to realspace echo in your mind.{/n} "I am the will of the Weaver of Destinies, and today, I will weave a new thread of elusive possibilities and fickle chances. The thread that will lead you out of the maw of irreversibility. The thread that will help you find the keys to salvation."

Gerçekuzaya geçtiğiniz sırada karşına çıkan {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_EdgeHelp}iblisin sözleri{/d} zihninde yankılanıyor.{/n} "Ben, Kader Dokuyan'ın iradesiyim ve bugün, ele zor geçen fırsatlar ve dönek ihtimallerle dolu yeni bir iplik dokuyacağım. Bu iplik, seni geri çevrilemezliğin sivri dişlerine uzanan yoldan kurtaracak. Kurtuluşun anahtarlarını bulmanda yardımcı olacak."
